definitions: the degree to which the plants and animals of a particular area are both native and restricted to it

examples.text: extreme endemism makes them exceptionally vulnerable to changes in their habitat

shortDefinitions: degree to which plants and animals of area are both native and restricted to it

definitions: the state or quality of being native and restricted to a certain area

examples.text: Madagascar has a high level of grass endemism

shortDefinitions: state or quality of being native and restricted to certain area
